page.title: 06 Winsford Sports'Facilities
page.content: Winsford has three sports' complexes: {WINSFORD SWIMMING AND SQUASH, KNIGHTS {GRANGE SPORTS}and{BARTON STADIUM. The swimming and squash centre contains: one{25m pool,}one{trainer pool,three {squash courts}in which they have different activities such as yoga,table tennis and squash lessons. In both pools they hold clubs and lessons for groups.The clubs are{ {turtles,sub-aqua and squad.}They have ten instructors. At Knights grange they have bowls,tennis,a 9-hole golf course, football/rugby pitches,cricket,crazy golf and hockey. {Winsford Utd. F.C.}plays at Barton Stadium.Sailing and fishing take place on the{Winsford Flashes.}
